Title: The "hoard wealth" metaphor for billionaires is so middle class coded. If you have 100k income you b...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: The "hoard wealth" metaphor for billionaires is so middle class coded. If you have 100k income you become a millionaire by hoarding wealth. If you have 100m in assets you get to 1B in a process that's the opposite of hoarding.
